ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ICMECAT - a catalog of interplanetary coronal mass ejections
ResourceHeader.Description: This is the HELIO4CAST interplanetary coronal mass ejection (ICME) catalog (ICMECAT), based on in situ magnetic field and bulk plasma observations in the heliosphere.

Parameter.Name: icmecat_id
Parameter.Description: icmecat_id: The unique identifier for the observed ICME. unit: string.

Parameter.Name: sc insitu
Parameter.Description: sc insitu: The name of the in situ observing spacecraft. unit: string.

Parameter.Name: icme_start_time
Parameter.Description: icme_start_time: Shock arrival or density enhancement time, can be similar to mo_start_time. unit: UTC.

Parameter.Name: mo_start_time
Parameter.Description: mo_start_time: Start time of the magnetic obstacle (MO), including flux ropes, flux-rope-like, and ejecta signatures. unit: UTC.

Parameter.Name: mo_end_time
Parameter.Description: mo_end_time: End time of the magnetic obstacle. unit: UTC.

Parameter.Name: mo_sc_heliodistance
Parameter.Description: mo_sc_heliodistance: Heliocentric distance of the spacecraft at mo_start_time. unit: AU.

Parameter.Name: mo_sc_long_heeq
Parameter.Description: mo_sc_long_heeq: Heliospheric longitude of the spacecraft at mo_start_time, range [-180,180]. unit: degree (HEEQ).

Parameter.Name: mo_sc_lat_heeq
Parameter.Description: mo_sc_lat_heeq: Heliospheric latitude of the spacecraft at mo_start_time, range [-90,90]. unit: degree (HEEQ).

Parameter.Name: icme_duration
Parameter.Description: icme_duration: Duration of the interval between icme_start_time and mo_endtime. unit: hours.

Parameter.Name: icme_bmax
Parameter.Description: icme_bmax: Maximum total magnetic field in the full icme interval (icme_start_time to mo_end_time). unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: icme_bmean
Parameter.Description: icme_bmean: Mean total magnetic field during the full icme interval (icme_start_time to mo_end_time). unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: icme_bstd
Parameter.Description: icme_bstd: Standard deviation of the total magnetic field from icme_start_time to mo_end_time. unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: icme_speed
Parameter.Description: 12: icme_speed_mean: Mean proton speed from icme_start_time to mo_end_time. unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: icme_speed_std
Parameter.Description: icme_speed_std: Standard deviation of proton speed from icme_start_time to mo_end_time. unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: mo_duration
Parameter.Description: mo_duration: Duration of the interval between mo_start_time and mo_endtime. unit: hours.

Parameter.Name: mo_bmax
Parameter.Description: mo_bmax: Maximum total magnetic field in the magnetic obstacle interval (mo_start_time to mo_end_time). unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: mo_bmean
Parameter.Description: mo_bmean: Mean total magnetic field in the magnetic obstacle. unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: mo_bstd
Parameter.Description: mo_bstd: Standard deviation of the total magnetic field in the magnetic obstacle. unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: mo_bzmean
Parameter.Description: mo_bzmean: Mean magnetic field Bz component in the magnetic obstacle. unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: mo_bzmin
Parameter.Description: mo_bzmin: Minimum magnetic field Bz component in the magnetic obstacle. unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: mo_bzstd
Parameter.Description: mo_bzstd: Standard deviation of the magnetic field Bz component in the magnetic obstacle. unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: mo_bymean
Parameter.Description: mo_bymean: Mean magnetic field By component in the magnetic obstacle. unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: mo_bystd
Parameter.Description: : mo_bystd: Standard deviation of the magnetic field By component in the magnetic obstacle. unit: nT.

Parameter.Name: mo_speed_mean
Parameter.Description: mo_speed_mean: Mean proton speed from mo_start_time to mo_end_time. unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: mo_speed_std
Parameter.Description: mo_speed_std: Standard deviation of proton speed from mo_start_time to mo_end_time. unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: mo_expansion_speed
Parameter.Description: mo_expansion_speed: Difference between proton speed at mo_start_time to proton speed at mo_end_time. unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: mo_pdyn_mean
Parameter.Description: mo_pdyn_mean: Mean proton dynamic pressure from mo_start_time to mo_start_time. unit: nPa.

Parameter.Name: mo_pdyn_std
Parameter.Description: mo_pdyn_std: Standard deviation of proton dynamic pressure from mo_start_time to mo_start_time. unit: nPa.

Parameter.Name: mo_density_mean
Parameter.Description: mo_density_mean: Mean proton density from mo_start_time to mo_start_time. unit: cm^-3.

Parameter.Name: mo_density_std
Parameter.Description: mo_density_std: Standard deviation of proton density from mo_start_time to mo_start_time. unit: cm^-3

Parameter.Name: mo_temperature_mean
Parameter.Description: mo_temperature_mean: Mean proton temperature from mo_start_time to mo_start_time. unit: K.

Parameter.Name: mo_temperature_std
Parameter.Description: mo_temperature_std: Standard deviation of proton temperature from mo_start_time to mo_end_time. unit: K.

Parameter.Name: sheath_speed_mean
Parameter.Description: sheath_speed_mean: Mean proton speed from icme_start_time to mo_start_time, NaN if these times are similar. unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: sheath_speed_std
Parameter.Description: sheath_speed_std: Standard deviation of proton speed from icme_start_time to mo_start_time, NaN if these times are similar. unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: sheath_density_mean
Parameter.Description: sheath_density_mean: Mean proton density from icme_start_time to mo_start_time, NaN if these times are similar. unit: cm^-3.

Parameter.Name: sheath_density_std
Parameter.Description: sheath_density_std: Standard deviation of proton density from icme_start_time to mo_start_time, NaN if these times are similar. unit: cm^-3.

Parameter.Name: sheath_pdyn_mean
Parameter.Description: sheath_pdyn_mean: Mean proton dynamic pressure, from icme_start_time to mo_start_time, NaN if these times are similar. unit: nPa.

Parameter.Name: sheath_pdyn_std
Parameter.Description: sheath_pdyn_std: Standard deviation of proton dynamic pressure, from icme_start_time to mo_start_time, NaN if these times are similar. unit: nPa.
